[\[1b.1\]{D1348}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI pa ra mAr+tha se bA/_bod skad du/_dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen pa/_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum la ni ye shes nyin mor
[\[1b.2\]]byed pa yi/_/dpal ldan shAkya'i seng ge byams pa'i mgon po dang /_/'jam dbyangs bcas pa yid bzhin nor dang grags pa dang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_/lta ba drug gi
[\[1b.3\]]gzhung mang rtog ge la sogs kyis/_/blo dman rnams kyis gang zhig brtag par dka' bas te/_/mdor bsdus pas ni 'jig rten lugs ni spangs nas su/_/don dam bsnyen pa de ni bdag gis bshad
[\[1b.4\]]par bya/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub slob dpon zhal gyi rjes 'brang bar/_/ma lus rdo rje theg par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/_/de phyir slob ma dam pa rnams kyis bla ma gser bzhin du/_/yongs
[\[1b.5\]]su brtags na sdig pa cung zad yod ma yin/_/gang las khyab 'jug bde 'byung drag po zla ba dang /_/nyi ma rgyu skar sgra gcan gza' sogs gyur pa yi/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yab de dag ni rnam spangs te/_/
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rmongs pas 'jig rten mes po'i lam la len par byed/_/'jig rten dag gi nges pa tshad mas dman pa ste/_/lta ba'i chos kyi dbye ba dag gi rnam pa mang /_/rig byed rtogs par dka' zhing dran pa tha dad
[\[2a.2\]]pas/_/'jig rten 'dir ni mkhas pa rnams kyis gang zhig 'dzin/_/thams cad mkhyen pa yis ni gsungs pa'i don gzhan la/_/lus mang po yis de ni gzhan du 'chad par byed/_/lta ba drug tu gnas pa bla mar rab grags
[\[2a.3\]]pa/_/khams ni rab tu rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid log khams/_/bla ma'i zhal gyis dman pa dag gis rgyud thos zer/_/mngon par dbang bskur mi 'gyur lam ni ma thob par/_/rdo rje slob dpon go 'phang chen po 'dir byed de/_/skye
[\[2a.4\]]bo rmongs pa 'di la ci zhig spyad pa'o/_/nor 'dod brkam pas mngon par dbang ni bskur bar byed/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor rdul tshon dag gis bri byed de/_/rdo yi rang bzhin 'dod pa'i rtags la mchod par byed/_/'bar ba'i thab khung
[\[2a.5\]]du ni mar la sogs pa sreg_/oM yig hUM yig ces ni 'dod pa'i sngags yin te/_/gzhan la phan pa ru ni 'di nyid brjod pa yin/_/blo gros nyams pa yis ni 'di dag mi shes te/_/gang gis sgra tsam dag ni de nyid sngags su
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'gyur/_/ngang pa'i rgyal med mtsho yi pad+ma'i lte bar ni/_/g.yon can bya dkar dag ni shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/_/nya yi rigs la de ni gsod pas gab pa ltar/_/bla ma ngan pas 'gro ba rnams la de bzhin no/_/pad+ma'i snying po ltar ni mgrin pa bstungs nas su/_/g.yon can
[\[2b.2\]]rkang pa ya gcig gis ni gnas pa ste/_/chu skyar 'dis ni nya rnams 'khrul pa byed pa ltar/_/bla ma ngan pas 'gro ba rnams la bya dkar bzhin/_/ji ltar zlos gar mkhan gyis gar gyi ngo bo bsgyur/_/'khor ba lha yi dbang po'i gzugs su byed pa ltar/_/lam dag med dang nor la 'dod cing
[\[2b.3\]]brkam pa yis/_/de bzhin dbang la rgyal ba'i cod pan 'ching bar byed/_/'dod la lhag zhen chang gi dbang gis bag med cing /_/khro ba'i sems dang bcas shing rdzas la mang du zhen/_/bden pa ma yin smra zhing bu rnams slu 'dod pa/_/bla ma de yis sdug bsngal ster ba ngo mtshar med/_/
[\[2b.4\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal me dag gis ni gdungs pa yis/_/rab rib mig gis bla ma dag gis gzung byas pa/_/shin tu gdung ba gzhom phyir lam chen gnas pa yi/_/gnyid log sbrul gyi dug gis 'khrul pa bzhin du'o/_/chos la zhen dang mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba la/_/rab zhen sems
[\[2b.5\]]ldan rmongs pa'i skye bo du ma la/_/yongs su brtags na dmyal ba'i me ni ster ba po/_/bla ma ngan pa ci yi phyir na sten par byed/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa'i dngos nyams pa/_/shes dang nges zhugs snying rje la sogs tha mi dad/_/dbang po bral zhing rtog pa brtag pa ru ni dang /_/
[\[2b.6\]]gnyis su med cing kun 'gro nges par zhi ba nyid/_/de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/_/de nyid 'jig rten mgon dang dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/de ni thugs kyi rdo rje rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal/_/de ni mi 'gyur 'gyur med rnal 'byor gyis ni bgrod/_/de ni dbang
[\[2b.7\]]phyug khyab 'jug dag dang mes po ste/_/bdud sogs 'joms med bde gshegs rgyal dbang po/_/grags pa de ni thub pa shAkya seng ge dpal/_/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal ldan dus 'khor lo/_/sprul pa 'di ltar zhi ba de ni bla ma dpal/_/rab tu sbas pa'i sangs rgyas bde
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ster sa gzhi la/_/bdud kyi dgra gcig skye 'gro yi ni rtsa lag gcig_/bla ma dam pa bsten pa rnams la yid bzhin nor/_/srid pa gsum gyi bsam gtan chags mnyam sgom pa po/_/chags chen 'dod chags chen po la ni thugs bcings pa/_/dbang po gnyis bde
[\[3a.2\]]sbyor zhing brtul zhugs chen po can/_/phyag rgya dag la sbyor yang chags pa nyams mi mnga'/_/nyi zla dag gi lam la rnal 'byor nyams pa dang /_/shes rab me la rnal 'byor stobs kyis rab tu zhugs/_/dpag med bde ba'i bdud rtsi btung la chags pa ste/_/sdig 'phrog rdo rje 'dzin pa
[\[3a.3\]]de ni bla ma dpal/_/bu bzang dag ni rnam par spangs nas tshol mi byed/_/bde bar 'ongs pa sbyin pa ru ni mi gtong ba/_/rnyed pa'i don la sogs pa ru ni 'dod ma yin/_/rnyed pa'i nor ni nye bar longs ni spyod mdzad pa/_/bla med rgyud kyi gsung ni yang dag ston pa'o/_/yon tan ldan pa'i
[\[3a.4\]]sras rnams la ni 'khor ba 'joms/_/rang lus tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas ni kun du ston/_/de ni bla ma'i dpal te bla ma dpal gzhan min/_/dpag med sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag tu de la mchod/_/phyogs bzhugs byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu de la 'dud/_/grub pa rnams kyis rdo
[\[3a.5\]]rje'i glu mang de la len/_/srid pa'i dgon par lhung la lam ni ston pa'o/_/'dod pa phal par zhen pa bla ma dpal ma yin/_/legs 'ongs nor la zhen pa bla ma dpal ma yin/_/skyes bu mkhas pa smod byed dpal ldan bla ma min/_/sems can snying brtse rnam spangs dpal ldan bla ma
[\[3a.6\]]min/_/dge 'dun dkor la rab spyod dpal ldan bla ma min/_/nor med slob ma 'dor ba dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bsgoms zin las rnams ster ba dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bu bzang kha sdom byed pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bu bzang de nyid sbed pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bu bzang slu
[\[3a.7\]]bar 'dod pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bu bzang yun rings khro ba dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bu bzang spong bar 'dod pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/ye shes dbang gis khengs bcas dpal ldan bla ma min/_/rdzas kyi dbang gis rab dga' dpal ldan bla ma min/_/phran tshegs khyim du bsti
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'dod dpal ldan bla ma min/_/rgyal srid sde la rab zhugs dpal ldan bla ma min/_/rang gi mgrin par skad 'chang dpal ldan bla ma min/_/khyab 'jug dbyu gu 'chang ba dpal ldan bla ma min/_/thal bas lus la byugs pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/ral pa 'chang dang skra bregs dpal
[\[3b.2\]]ldan bla ma min/_/mgo bo'i thod pa 'chang ba dpal ldan bla ma min/_/gcer bu dang ni skra 'bal dpal ldan bla ma min/_/dben pa'i dbang gis rab dga' dpal ldan bla ma min/_/lus la dmar po'i gos gyon dpal ldan bla ma min/_/pus 'khyud rab tu 'ching ba dpal ldan bla ma
[\[3b.3\]]min/_/sngags zlos bgrang phreng can ni dpal ldan bla ma min/_/chang gi dbang gis bag med dpal ldan bla ma min/_/srog chags rnams la sems sdang dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bde ba'i dbang gis rab dga' dpal ldan bla ma min/_/'gyur ba'i bde la chags pa dpal
[\[3b.4\]]ldan bla ma min/_/sdug bsngal dbang gis gdungs pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/thar pa'i lam la bag med dpal ldan bla ma min/_/lam las nyams pa'i sems ldan dpal ldan bla ma min/_/kun 'gro chos ni nyams pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/rang dbang sdug bsngal byed pa
[\[3b.5\]]dpal ldan bla ma min/_/'khar gsil lhung bzed lag 'chang dpal ldan bla ma min/_/bla gab med pa'i rnal 'byor dpal ldan bla ma min/_/shing gi drung na gnas pa dpal ldan bla ma min/_/sdug bsngal ster ba'i phyag dar dpal ldan bla ma min/_/dus su za ba'i dge slong
[\[3b.6\]]dpal ldan bla ma min/_/skye bo med pa'i rdzong gnas dpal ldan bla ma min/_/brag phug rnams su rab zhugs dpal ldan bla ma min/_/gang zhig yon tan ring phung dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig srid pa'i skyon 'joms dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig snyan pa'i ngag smra dpal ldan
[\[3b.7\]]bla ma de/_/gang zhig lam bzangs ston pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig dmyal ba'i me 'joms dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig srid pa'i phar sgrol dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig 'gro ba'i mig gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig 'gro ba'i rje gcig dpal ldan
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]bla ma de/_/gang zhig 'gro ba'i zla gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig skye 'gro'i nyi gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig bde gshegs rje rigs dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig mi zad lam ston dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig mgrin par thos 'dzin dpal ldan
[\[4a.2\]]bla ma de/_/gang zhig mi 'gyur dbus 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig yon tan rdul lus dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig rgyal po'i spyod 'ching dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig lus kyi mgo 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/_/
[\[4a.3\]]gang zhig skra 'bal ba yi dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig srid gdug gcer bu dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig dus gos 'dzin pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig bdud rtsi'i 'thung chags dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig dam tshig la zhugs dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig
[\[4a.4\]]lus srung 'dod pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig rlung gi phreng ldan dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig rgyal ba'i shing drung dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig brtul zhugs snod 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig bde ba'i khrod 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig mi zad
[\[4a.5\]]dus za'i dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig nam mkha'i gnas zhugs dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig nam mkha'i phug zhugs dpal ldan bla ma de/_/gang zhig sems can mnyam sems dpal ldan bla ma de/_/'jigs med dag gsum ster ba bla ma dpal gang de/_/dpal
[\[4a.6\]]ldan bla ma de ni ci phyir bsten mi bya/_/dpal ldan bla ma de ni ci phyir tshim mi bya/_/dpal ldan bla ma de ni ci phyir mchod mi bya/_/dpal ldan bla ma de la ci phyir phyag mi bya/_/mal stan bzhon pa bran khol zho shas 'tsho rnams dang /_/yan lag bzang po bu mo mdzes ma rnams dang ni/_/chung
[\[4a.7\]]ma snying sdug bu dang rtsa lag bcas pa dang /_/ma lus pa yis kyang ni bde ba ster ba la'o/_/sA lu'i zan dang sha dang dri zhim mar dag dang /_/bza' dang bca' ba sbyin pa yid 'ong mang po dang /_/tam po la dang ga bur kha bshal bzang po dang /_/gla rtsi la sogs pa yis bdud mang
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dgra la'o/_/rab tu 'chang ba'i do shal nor bu rna cha dang /_/ske rags dang bcas rkang gdub yan lag srung dang ni/_/cod pan dang bcas dpung rgyan rke nor bzang sogs dang /_/sna tshogs na bza' yis ni sdug bsngal mang 'joms la'o/_/byug pa dang ni gur gum tsan+dan la sogs pa/_/a
[\[4b.2\]]ga ru nag sih+la la sogs spos dang ni/_/tsam pa ka mchog la sogs dri zhim me tog dang /_/rin chen mar mes lam ni mi nyams la'o/_/rtsod ldan dbang gis bla ma skyon dang yon tan 'dres/_/rnam pa kun du sdig pa med pa yod ma yin/_/gang zhig yon tan lhag pa yang ni legs
[\[4b.3\]]dpyad nas/_/bu rnams kyis ni de la brten par 'gyur ba'o/_/rdo dang shing gi rang bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_/skye ba 'bum phrag gis ni thar pa mi ster ro/_/skye ba 'di nyid du yang gang zhig brtag pa ni/_/bla ma bsten pa yis ni bde ba ster bar mdzad/_/spun dang chung ma snying
[\[4b.4\]]sdug grogs po mgon po dang /_/bla ma dag dang mtshungs pa'i pha ma yod ma yin/_/skye ba 'di nyid du yang sdug bsngal 'joms pa yi/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dpal bzangs dag gis ster ba'o/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i blo yis bsten bya yi/_/ji ltar phyi dus sdug bsngal ster bar min
[\[4b.5\]]pa'o/_/ma dag sems kyis bstan pas sdug bsngal 'gyur ba ste/_/dper na rims nad rgyas pa la ni mar gyi btung ba bzhin/_/ji ltar bde ba'i don du bla mas ma byas pas/_/nyams pa'i sems kyis sdug bsngal mang du ster bar byed/_/shing las ring du lhung ba'i sdug bsngal mchog min
[\[4b.6\]]pas/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu sngon du bor ba mchog yin no/_/ltos 'gro'i dug ni myur du khyab pa dag dang ni/_/gdong lnga pa dang nges par glang po che dang ni/_/khro bo chen po'i gshin rje kha ni mchog yin gyi/_/gdug pa'i slob mas bla ma la ni brten pa min/_/dpal ldan blo ma'i zhabs la brten
[\[4b.7\]]par 'dod pa de/_/rab tu khros pas skye ba brgya ru mi 'dod pa'o/_/de phyir rang gi blo yis dpyad nas ni/_/bsten par bya yi khro ba ru ni mi bya'o/_/rdo ba dang ni shing gi rang bzhin gzugs brnyan gyi/_/de la pha rol zhen pas 'dir ni mchog byed cing /_/gang zhig sems dang bcas pas yon
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]tan rgya mtsho yi/_/bla ma chen po de ni yongs su sun 'don te/_/du ma'i bdud dang dmyal ba'i me ni bskyod pa dang /_/bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis rtag tu de bzung ste/_/sems bcas gsal ba rgyal ba'i dbang po spangs nas ni/_/gang zhig sems med pa
[\[5a.2\]]la rab tu mchod byed do/_/'jam pa'i dpal ni dang po'i sangs rgyas yin pa la/_/ston pa gzhan dag rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa ni/_/ci phyir zhe na sems can gdul ba'i don yin gyi/_/gzhan du thar pa la ni 'dod cing chags pas min/_/de bzhin bla mas 'dod pa'i rtags ni bkod
[\[5a.3\]]nas su/_/mi shes 'jig rten rnams kyi bsod nams rgyu ru ni/_/phyag mang ba dang mchod pa dag kyang mdzad pa ste/_/'on kyang mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la chags pa min/_/chung ma bu dang rtsa lag mang po'i sde rnams dang /_/so ba nor dang rgyal srid dgra med phyogs dang ni/_/grub pa nyid
[\[5a.4\]]dang dbang po drang srong dang bcas pa/_/re zhig lus po 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid do/_/khams gsum rnam pa brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba ni/_/cung zhig mi bzad pa ni gal te 'dir mthong dang /_/gang zhig dngos po'i gzugs ni mi shigs yod 'gyur na/_/'di rnams dag la gti mug ched du
[\[5a.5\]]chags par gyis/_/ji srid 'chi bdag rab tu ma sang bar du ni/_/de srid du ni khyod kyis lus 'di bsrung bar gyis/_/'di ni rab tu sad na khyod kyis bsrungs na yang /_/lus ni nges pa ru ni ce spyang rnams la ster/_/de bzhin du ni chung ma dang ni bu dang rtsa lag dang /_/grogs dang mgon po
[\[5a.6\]]dag la skyabs su song na yang /_/'bar ba la sogs pa la dus kyis byin pas na/_/dbang po la sogs kyis ni bsrung bar nus ma yin/_/grub pa dang ni drang srong lha yi dbang po dang /_/dpag med bgrang du med pa de yis zad par khrid/_/ye shes me ni ji srid mthong bar ma gyur par/_/rang
[\[5a.7\]]gi las dag su zhig gis ni bzlog par 'gyur/_/'di dag thams cad mi rtag 'dod pa ma yin te/_/ye shes bdud rtsi bla ma'i zhal ni 'dod pa'o/_/gnyis po 'di las bde dang sdug bsngal rab tu skyed/_/nges par legs par brtags na ci zhig la ni len/_/'khor ba'i rdzong dag tu ni
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]'khyam pa'i rang bzhin can/_/ji srid rang gi lus la mchod par byed pa bas/_/mya ngan las 'das bde ba ma lus ster mdzad pa/_/de srid de ni bla mar ci yi phyir mi byed/_/rang gis bsags pa'i nor rnams kun kyang byin nas ni/_/dmyal ba'i me ster bud med dag ni len
[\[5b.2\]]par byed/_/sangs rgyas yan lag bzang mo 'khyud pa ster mdzad gang /_/ci phyir bzang mo de ni bla ma la mi 'bul/_/so ba dang ni nor rnams yid du 'ong ba dang /_/yan lag bzang mo dag ni bsod nams stobs las 'gyur/_/sdig pa dag gi dbang gis yun rings bsags
[\[5b.3\]]pa yi/_/rab tu 'bad de bsrung bar byas kyang nyams par 'gyur/_/de phyir khyad par 'phags shing yid du 'ong ba yi/_/skye ba du ma ru ni bde ba ster byed pa/_/gang la nges par phul bas rab tu 'gyur ba yi/_/nor rnams kun gyis bla ma'i zhal la dbul bar bya/_/byin
[\[5b.4\]]pa'i nor rnams 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_/shin tu rnam dag sa la sa bon btab pa bzhin/_/de rnams rab tu ma byin 'bras bu med pa ni/_/dper na sa bzang dag la sa bon ma btab par/_/sa bon ma btab zhing la 'bru yi ched du ni/_/rmongs pa shin tu nyon mongs par ni
[\[5b.5\]]byed pa ltar/_/bla ma la ni nor ma phul ba de bzhin du/_/'dzin par 'dod pa dag ni sa la 'khyam par byed/_/nor la 'dod cing brkam pas zhing gi las la ni/_/rten dang tshong dang rig pa dag ni 'dzin par byed/_/de ltar na yang bkren pa'i dus ni du ma ru/_/myur ba dag tu 'ongs nas
[\[5b.6\]]sdig can la ni gnas/_/nyon mongs ma gtogs 'bru dang gser dang chung ma dang /_/bsod nams mang byed pa la bsam mi khyab par 'gyur/_/grub pa nyid dang dbang po drang srong mchog rnams dang /_/dgra med rgyal srid sa bzhi'i bde ba ster ba'o/_/khams gsum dag na gang dag
[\[5b.7\]]bde ba cung zad ni/_/ma lus de ni bla ma dgyes pa'i stobs kyis so/_/bkres dang nad dang dmyal ba'i me yi sdug bsngal ni/_/mi bzad de ni mi dgyes pa las byung ba yin/_/bla ma'i drin gyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur ba ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bla med rgyud gsungs
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]pa/_/de ni ma dgyes pa yis dmyal bar 'jug pa yi/_/tshig 'di nyid ni de dang de yi rgyud la gnas/_/yon tan dam pas gang bar bla ma'i thugs shes nas/_/'khor ba'i rgyu ru gang rnams kyis ni dor bar byed/_/grangs med bskal par bde ba nyams pa de rnams ni/_/
[\[6a.2\]]rdo rje me yis smin pa'i dmyal ba dag tu 'tsher/_/bla ma dam pa slu bar byed dang sdig sogs gang /_/slob ma 'ba' zhig rnams ni de ru mi 'tshed kyi/_/de bzhin bla ma yang ni zhen pa'i dbang gis nyams/_/chags pa la sogs 'bar ba'i me la rab tu 'jug_/bla ma dang ni slob ma nges par rnam
[\[6a.3\]]par nyams/_/rang rang sdug bsngal 'di ni gnyis ka'i thun mong ngo /_/de bas bla ma slob ma 'di ru nyams pa ni/_/rang gi blo yis ring du yongs su spang bar bya/_/smyon pa rdo rje'i sen mo gdong pa lnga pa dang /_/rkang brgyad khro bo'i gdong la mche ba dang ldan dang /_/shin tu khro ba'i gdengs ka
[\[6a.4\]]'dzin pa mchog yin gyi/_/lam nyams bla ma slob ma dag ni 'di ltar min/_/bla ma ltung ba las ni slob ma mi ltung ba/_/slob ma ltung ba yis ni bla ma yang mi nyams/_/shing gi yal ga mthon por 'dzeg pa dag las ni/_/gang zhig ltung bar gyur pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/bla na med pa'i rgyud
[\[6a.5\]]las ltung ba bcu bzhis ni/_/rtsa ba dang bcas dngos grub dag ni 'phrog par byed/_/dpag med bskal pa ru ni bde ba rnam par nyams/_/las ngan la gnas dbang bskur slob ma rnams la gsung /_/bla ma'i sems sun pa yis ltung ba gcig yin te/_/bka' ni yongs su spangs pa'i dbang las
[\[6a.6\]]gnyis pa'o/_/spun la rab tu khros nas smra ba gsum pa ste/_/byams pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbang gis bzhi pa'o/_/dpal ldan byang chub sems spangs dbang gis mda' zhes bya/_/grub pa'i mtha' la skyon bzung bas ni drug pa ste/_/sngags pa min la phebs par smra bas ri zhes bya/_/
[\[6a.7\]]phung po so sor nyon mongs byed pa brgyad pa yin/_/dag pa'i chos la ma dad pas ni gza' zhes bya/_/gdug pa dang bcas byams pa bzung bas phyogs zhes so/_/dam pa'i chos la kun rtog dbang gis drag po zhes/_/dag pa'i sems can sun 'byin pa yis nyi ma ste/_/dam tshig bsten
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]par ma byas pa yis yan lag med/_/bud med rnams la bshung ba yis ni bcu bzhi yin/_/'di rnams dag ni yongs su spangs par byas nas ni/_/'dod pa'i blo yis bla ma la ni bsten par bya/_/'dod chags la sogs pa dang mi shes dbang gis ni/_/bag med slob ma rnams
[\[6b.2\]]ni gal te ltung 'gyur na/_/slar yang rab tu gnas par bya phyir dbang nyid ni/_/phyir bzlog pa la 'di ni nges par bya ba'o/_/dbang bdun bskur ba rnams la zlog pa yod pa ste/_/mi shes dbang gis gsang ba la ni brgya lam na/_/shes rab mngon par dbang bskur ba la ldog med
[\[6b.3\]]de/_/dper na mi yi bdag po g.yul du shi bzhin no/_/lha mo re re'i rgyal ba'i sngags ni brjod pa las/_/stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug po ni nges bya zhing /_/bzlas pa dag gi mtha' ru tshogs kyis tshim par bya/_/thun mong skyon gyis kyang ni chad pa 'di nyid yin/_/ji ltar rang gi nus pas
[\[6b.4\]]bla ma la ni yon/_/phul nas rang gi rigs su thun mong pa ru 'gyur/_/de yi sems kyi rten dag shes par byas nas ni/_/lhag pa'am ni nyung bar bla mas nges par sbyin/_/tshogs dang bzlas pa'am ni mchod pa dag gis te/_/de rnams la ni bla ma dag par rab sbyin bya/_/shin tu ring
[\[6b.5\]]ba'i shing las ring por lhung gyur pa'i/_/lus po la ni rkang pas brdeg par mi bya'o/_/de dag rnams kyi sems la skyon ni rjes gnas pa/_/'di rnams 'chad pa ci zhig sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen te/_/de lta na yang rmongs pas rab sad bya ba'i phyir/_/chad pa sbyin gyi 'di ni chad pa ma yin
[\[6b.6\]]no/_/gang zhig sems la gnas pa'i ma lus mkhyen pa yi/_/rje mo dang bcas bde bar gshegs pas 'chad pa sol/_/dge dang mi dge las kyi 'bras bu de rnams la/_/chad pa gang ster bla ma 'dir ni gang zhig yin/_/dpyid zla 'bring po'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi cha la ni/_/dpal ldan
[\[6b.7\]]dkyil 'khor de ni legs par bris nas su/_/bla mas mngon par dbang bskur rnam bdun sbyin bya zhing /_/dpal ldan bstan pa'i don du 'khor lo mchod par bya/_/mchod pa med pas nges par dus kyi 'khor lo ni/_/bstan pa dag ni dag pa'i lo 'di ma yin no/_/gal te gang zhig skal
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]ldan thos 'dod slob ma ni/_/'khor lo'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dag ni de yis bya/_/ji ltar bu bzangs kyis ni bag ma blang ba'i rgyur/_/rang gi pha la nam yang gsol ba mi 'debs te/_/yon tan dang bcas dus la bab pa'i bu la ni/_/pha nyid kyis ni bag ma'i bya
[\[7a.2\]]ba shes par byed/_/de bzhin slob ma rnams kyis bla med dbang gi phyir/_/bla ma la ni nan gyis gsol ba mi gdab bo/_/bdag gi slob ma skal ba ldan nam mi ldan pa'i/_/rnam par dag pa'i de nyid de la de yis shes/_/rnam par dag pa'i slob ma nor ni med pa la/_/rdzogs pa'i
[\[7a.3\]]byang chub rgyu ru dbang bskur rin po che/_/rang gi ngag gis kun nas rnam par dag pa 'di/_/mchod pa med na'ang bla ma yis ni sbyin par bya/_/chags pas mngon par khengs pa'i nga rgyal can dang ni/_/chags pas bag med g.yo can gyi ni mi la ni/_/gang zhig rgyal ba'i bka' yis
[\[7a.4\]]thar pa'i 'bras bu ster/_/bla ma'i zhal gyis de nyid byin la ma byin pa'o/_/gang gi yid kyi rang bzhin gang gis shes na ni/_/ston pa de yis de la rang gi zhal sbyin no/_/gang zhig dag pa'i slob ma'i rang bzhin shes pa yi/_/mngon shes dang ldan bla ma gang yang yod ma yin/_/ma dag
[\[7a.5\]]pa yi sems la bla ma'i 'dod pa'i zhal/_/rims nad rab rgyas rnams la mar gyi btung ba bzhin/_/byin nas rang gi lus la 'chi ba chen por byed/_/bde bas 'khrul pa bzhin du blo gros nyams pa la/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan mnyam pa'i bde ba'i rgyur/_/rang gi
[\[7a.6\]]sems ni so sor snang ba tsam du bsgom/_/dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal ster ba de nyid ni/_/rang gi sems kyi skyon gyis bdud du skye bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje dag gis sprul pa'i gzugs rnams du ma ni/_/sdig pa'i stobs kyis khyad par du ni rgud pa ste/_/gshin rje'i gnas ni gdug
[\[7a.7\]]pa'i 'khor gyis yongs gang ba/_/gshin rje khros pas rdo rje'i me ni sbyin pa'o/_/de phyir bla ma dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang po'i gzugs/_/rnam par ma dag blo yis bsten par mi bya'o/_/dper na rgyal po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/_/dga' dang khro bas bde dang sdug
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]bsngal ster ba bzhin/_/ma dag sems kyis 'di ni shi bar gyur pa na/_/gshin rje'i khro bo'i gdong pa rab tu gtum pa dang /_/rdo rje me ni smin pa mi bzad mthong nas ni/_/nyon mongs kha yis ha ha'i sgra ni smra bar byed/_/sngon du bsags pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rab tu rgyas/_/khyod kyis
[\[7b.2\]]'dir ni nges par longs spyod pa ru gyis/_/bla ma la sogs 'gyod par byas dang bag med dang /_/sdang ba khyod kyis nga yi bka' la ci zhig byed/_/'dod pa'i blo gros dpal ldan rdo rje can gyis ni/_/mi bzad dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lung las ma gsungs sam/_/sdig pa'i stobs
[\[7b.3\]]kyis rab tu khyab pa dag tu 'gyur/_/sdang ba khyod ni ci yi phyir na sdig pa byed/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis dman slob ma rnam dag pa/_/gang gi bka' yis thar pa'i go 'phang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rab zhi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/_/'khor ba'i rgyu ru khyod kyis kyang ni 'dor byed
[\[7b.4\]]dam/_/gshin rje'i bka' yis khro bo'i 'khor rnams kyis bzung ste/_/rab tu 'dar zhing gshin rje me rab gtum pa yi/_/smin par zhugs shing sog le dang ni rtse gsum gyis/_/blo gros rnam par nyams la gcod dang 'bigs par byed/_/slob ma dmus long de ni 'di ru ngo
[\[7b.5\]]mtshar med/_/mig dang bcas pa'i bla ma long ba ngo mtshar che/_/rgyud rnams thos nas nor dang 'dod chags la zhen pa/_/de la yang ni nges par ston pa'i zhal med do/_/rgyal srid dpal ni ma lus rnam par spangs nas su/_/dpag med sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub yang
[\[7b.6\]]dag bsten/_/skal ldan yon tan rnams kyis de ni nges par lhag_/de bas rgyal ba rnams kyis nam yang mi 'dor ro/_/bde ba rnam par ma nyams thar pa'i dpal de ni/_/bor nas yan lag bzang po'i na chung dag la mos/_/sngon du bsags pa'i las ni nges par drag po
[\[7b.7\]]ste/_/gang gis bdud rtsi bor nas dug ni 'thung bar byed/_/gzhan dag rnams ni bud med lus kyi 'dod chags zhen/_/lus po sbyin par byas nas nor ni 'dzin par byed/_/shin tu bsod pa'i zas la zhen pa'i nya bzhin du/_/skad cig bde ba'i rgyu yis rab tu nyams par 'gyur/_/bram
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]ze gang gis rang gzugs pags pa'i rang bzhin gyi/_/dga' ma la ni so sor brten pa'i don dag tu/_/'jug ngogs dag tu song nas slar yang 'ongs nas ni/_/gzugs brnyan 'dod ma de ni mdzes ma mos pa med/_/de bzhin du ni rgyal ba'i sprul pa'i sku dag la/_/'jug
[\[8a.2\]]ngogs la brten rang gi don 'dod du ma dang /_/'khor ba'i bde ba so sor zhen cing chags pa can/_/bstan pa'i rtags la gus byed rnams kyis mchod mi byed/_/gzhan dag kyang ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub dag la zhen/_/pri ya gang dang n+ya gro d+ha 'og gangs kyi gnas/_/'jigs byed ri dang
[\[8a.3\]]'jug ngogs dang ni gzhan dag la/_/lam las rnam par nyams pa rnams ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/bram ze rnams la rang nor ma lus byin nas ni/_/nyi ma zla ba gza' yis zin pa lhung bar byed/_/thub par dka' ba'i bdud kyi tshogs kyis rnam par rmongs/_/'khor ba'i 'brog
[\[8a.4\]]tu lam ni rnam par nyams pa yin/_/mi rnams gang zhig bla ma dam pa'i zhal dman pas/_/mi bzad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par brnag bzod cing /_/lam ngan yang dag 'dres pa'i dbang gis rnam nyams te/_/dper na dgon par zhugs pa'i ded dpon dang mtshungs
[\[8a.5\]]so/_/des na bla ma thar pa'i lam ni ster ba po/_/slob ma yis ni shin tu gus pas bsten bya ste/_/chung ma dang ni bu dang g.yo ba ma lus dang /_/lus dang ngag dang yid ni g.yo ba med pas so/_/thun mtshams gsum du shin tu rnam par dag pa yis/_/kha dang lag pa rkang pa dag
[\[8a.6\]]ni khrus byas te/_/me tog yang dag blangs nas bla ma'i spyan sngar ni/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu zlum por bya/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes me tog gis mchod cing /_/shin tu gus pas spyi bo lag pas phyag bya'o/_/bla ma'i zhal nas bka' ni rab tu thos nas su/_/sa la 'khod
[\[8a.7\]]de rang gi khyim du 'gro bar bya/_/bla ma dag gi spyan sngar rkang pa brkyang ba dang /_/gdug pa'i kha yis rab tu brjod pa dag dang ni/_/g.yan pa 'phrug dang tsug tsug dang ni bzhad gad dang /_/skyes bu gzhan gyi skyon brjod gtam ni mi bya'o/_/lam bzangs shes pa sngon du 'gro bar mi bya
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ste/_/gnang ba blangs nas mi shes pa la 'gro bar bya/_/bla mas byin pa lag pa gnyis kyis blang bya zhing /_/rang gis 'bul na spyi bo yis ni phyag bya'o/_/bla ma mgron nas byon 'dir shin tu gus pa yis/_/phrag dog yongs su spangs pa'i rgyu ru sdug ma ni/_/bde ba ster ba'i don du dga'
[\[8b.2\]]bar byas nas ni/_/rang gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyangs te dbul bar bya/_/ji ltar rang gi sems ni skyo bar mi 'gyur bar/_/ma 'ongs pa ru de ni yongs su smin par bya/_/sems ni rab tu skyo bas dam tshig nyams pa nyid/_/nyams pa'i dbang gis dmyal ba dag tu rab tu 'jug_/de bzhin bu yi
[\[8b.3\]]chung ma bu mo sring mo dang /_/sgyug mo la sogs dang ni rigs ldan khyo med ma/_/mnyam pa'i bde ba'i don du blo rgyas slob ma yis/_/rim gyis rim gyis de rnams yongs su sbyin par bya/_/dag cing bzhin ldan khyo med rnams dang rigs ldan ma/_/bla ma'i zhabs gnyis la ni ma lus
[\[8b.4\]]dbul bya zhing /_/dbang bdun gyis ni mngon par dbang ni bskur rnams la/_/ji ltar rjes su mthun la chags pa'i don du'o/_/de bzhin 'dir ni rigs ldan khyo med bsten bya ba/_/ji ltar chags pas mngal du 'dzin par mi 'gyur bya/_/mngal nas 'dod min skye bo'i kha na ma
[\[8b.5\]]tho ba/_/skye bo'i kha na ma thos 'jig rten pha rol nyams/_/chags pa 'dod cing gti mug dbang du gyur pa la/_/de phyir khyo med rigs ldan dag ni sbyin mi bya/_/khro ba'i sems dang bcas shing chang mi 'thung ba dang /_/ngang tshul mi shes pa dang nor ni med pa la/_/nor gyis rnyed sla
[\[8b.6\]]'gag pa med pa'i smad 'tshong ma/_/bsod nams mang po'i rgyu ru de rnams sbyin par bya/_/rtag pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru yang dag gsang ba ni/_/slob dpon chen po'i go 'phang gnas la dbul bar bya/_/bza' bca' yon tan brgyad 'gyur mar mes 'bras bu ster/_/mar me brgyad 'gyur
[\[8b.7\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chang /_/chang gi brgyad 'gyur na chung ma la rab sbyor te/_/de phyir 'dod pa'i sbyin pa nges par khyad par 'phags/_/bza' bca' sha dang ldan pa phyag rgya bzang mo dang /_/dkon pa rnyed pa rtag par bla ma la dbul bya/_/mal stan dag dang na bza' dang ni byug pa
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]dang /_/khyad par 'phags pa rang gi rje la dbul bar bya/_/dngos grub dag la chags pas bla ma'i spyan snga ru/_/blo gros rgyas pa rnams kyis ngan pa rang gis blang /_/rang gi khyim na bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya med pa na/_/rang gi phyag rgya la ni brten par mi bya'o/_/
[\[9a.2\]]shes rab dbang gis mngon par dbang ni bskur rnams la/_/dpal ldan ston pa ru ni yang dag gnas rnams kyis/_/chang rnams nges par shes rab rang bzhin yin pas na/_/shes rab rnam par dman pas 'dir ni btung ma bya/_/btung ba'i brtul zhugs don du dag rung ma dag
[\[9a.3\]]rung /_/rang gi 'khor lo la ni phyag rgya gzung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba mchog gis dbang bskur ting 'dzin don dag las/_/dbang gi don du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems/_/yan lag dkar zhing bcu gnyis lo lon gzhon nu ma/_/de bzhin gzhan dag skye bo'i lo ni nyi shu ma/_/
[\[9a.4\]]dam tshig ldan zhing bu ma btsas pa gzung bya ste/_/dbang gi don du bla ma dag gis bka' stsal pa/_/sdang dang nad pa skal ba ngan dang ma dul dang /_/khengs shing rdzas la brkam pa dang ni rtsod 'dod dang /_/bla mar mi gus gzhan dag la ni sun 'don ma/_/'jigs pa ster ba mo de
[\[9a.5\]]sbrul bzhin spang bar bya/_/ting 'dzin rgyu ru mnyam pa'i bde ba ster mdzad ma/_/dam tshig la zhugs rgan pa'i bud med mchog yin gyi/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal ster zhing mnyam pa'i bde 'joms ma/_/dam tshig rab dman bu mo gzhon nu ma nyid ma yin no/_/mkhris pa'i rims la
[\[9a.6\]]mkhris pas zhi bar byed pa'o/_/rgun 'brum la sogs med pa'i sngon du mchog yin gyi/_/rab tu zhi ba'i mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/smin pa mngar ba dri zhim ta la ma yin no/_/slob mas rang gi phyag rgya bla mar phul ba ni/_/de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su chags byas la/_/slar yang bla mas
[\[9a.7\]]slob ma la ni de sbyin bya/_/gzhan dag tu ni slob ma'i skye bos bsten bya min/_/gang yang slob ma'i yan lag bla mas ma gnang ba/_/rtag par slob ma rnams kyis spyi bos de la 'dud/_/rtag pa'i dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma'i bka' yis ni/_/mnyam pa'i bde ba ster mdzad bsten bya
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]bsten mi bya/_/phyag rgya rab tu sbyor la rnam dag bde bas ni/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par byed pa thob 'gyur te/_/skye ba 'di ru rang gi lus kyi bdud 'joms par/_/'gyur ba de ni 'di ru shin tu ngo mtshar che/_/gang rnams drin gyis dngos grub bzang por 'gyur ba dang /_/gang
[\[9b.2\]]rnams drin gyis yang dag rdzu 'phrul 'gyur ba dang /_/gang rnams drin gyis bde ba rab tu skye ba dang /_/gang rnams drin gyis srid pa'i me las grol bar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun la rab tu mang du mchod/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni mang du bsten par bya/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun la mang
[\[9b.3\]]du tshim par bya/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun la mang du phyag bya zhing /_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i yum yin te/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni thub pa'i lcam mo yin/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i sras mo ste/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i tsha mo'o/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun
[\[9b.4\]]ni bde gshegs thugs sdud ma/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni bu rnams bde ster ma/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni dgra rnams 'jigs ster ma/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i khyim/_/phyag rgya de rnams kun la rang gi bla ma bas/_/lhag par mchod cing spyi bo yis ni phyag bya zhing /_/
[\[9b.5\]]ji ltar rang gi nus pas 'dod pa gnas pas na/_/bu bzangs rnams kyis nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/'dod chags gang nyid kyis ni sems can ltung byed pa'i/_/de nyid kyis ni rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig dug nyid kyis ni sems can 'chi byed de/_/dug sngags
[\[9b.6\]]shes pas de nyid kyis ni nad 'joms byed/_/dpal ldan tshangs par spyod pa bud med la sbyor ba/_/bla na med pa'i rgyud las dor bar ma gsungs so/_/dug gi de nyid smra bas dug gis dbang po zos/_/'on te ma zos na ni grags par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyid log pa dang sangs pa dug ni mi
[\[9b.7\]]shes pa/_/dper na bu yi lus la sbrul gyi mche bas btab/_/de bzhin du ni yid bzhin nor bu byang chub sems/_/de nyid med la bud med b+ha ga'i sbrul gyis btab/_/sngags pa rnams la 'pho ba'i skad cig zhi byed min/_/skye ba du ma'i mtha' ru sdug bsngal ster ba'o/_/'chi med gdengs
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]ka'i dug gi mche ba langs pa na/_/rab tu khros pas ji lta bur na zhi bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar rdo yi gos ni me yis gdungs pa na/_/zhu bar 'gyur gyi thal ba ru ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin chu skyes sbyor bas mchog gi byang chub sems/_/rtsol ldan rnams la 'di ni
[\[10a.2\]]rang bzhin gyis dag 'gyur/_/me dang dngul chu dag ni rtag par dgra nyid do/_/me med pa yis kyang ni dngul chu mi 'ching ste/_/dngul chu ma bcings pa yis khams rnams 'bigs mi 'gyur/_/khams rnams ma phug pa yis gser du 'gyur ba min/_/gser du ma gyur pa las rdzas ni
[\[10a.3\]]mi 'phel lo/_/nor gyis rnam par dman pas yul gyi longs spyod med/_/longs spyod ma rtogs sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa ru/_/bcud len smra ba rnams kyi lus la 'gyur ba'o/_/bud med skye gnas dang sbyor 'pho ba med pa yis/_/de bzhin gnyis po yang ni dgra chen nyid yin
[\[10a.4\]]no/_/sbyor ba ma rtogs g.yo ba'i sems ni mi 'ching ste/_/sems ma bcings pa yis ni lus la 'bigs pa med/_/ma phug pa yis lus la dag pa'i spyod pa med/_/ma dag spyod pa yis ni bde ba mi ster ro/_/bde ba ma rtogs 'gro drug sdug bsngal mi bzad par/_/bag
[\[10a.5\]]med pa yis sngags pa ngan pa rnams la 'gyur ba'o/_/bud med sbyor ba dman pas thar pa'i bde ba med/_/bud med sbyor ba dman kyang srid me'i sdug bsngal med/_/de bas rang gi blo yis legs par dpyad nas ni/_/sngags pas gang la mos pa yang ni blang bar bgyis/_/
[\[10a.6\]]shing las me dang chu yang chu shel dag las so/_/zho las mar dang rdo ba las ni lcags kyi rigs/_/bud med skye gnas sbyor las bde ba ma nyams par/_/skal ldan thabs kyis sbyor bas de ni blang bar gyis/_/rgyud kyi thog ma dbus mtha' la gnas 'dod pa ni/_/dge bar
[\[10a.7\]]gsungs pa bya mi yi ni zhal nyid do/_/sbas pa'i yid bzhin nor bu brtag par dka' ba ni/_/bla ma dam pa slu ba po yis zin mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje bslang ba dag ni dang por gsungs pa ste/_/rdo rje me la srog zhugs pas ni gnyis pa'o/_/dpal ldan mi 'gyur byang chub sems ni gsum pa
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]yin/_/'di dag nyid ni dge ba'i brtul zhugs chen po'o/_/'di ltar nyams pa'i bde ba dge ba ma yin zhing /_/'di ltar bstan bcos tshig ni dge ba ma yin no/_/'di ltar gtsug lag khang gnas dge ba ma yin te/_/'di ltar lus la sdug bsngal dge ba ma yin no/_/mya ngan
[\[10b.2\]]'das pa'i bde la rab tu chags pa rnams/_/gang zhig 'dod chags bral ba 'dir ni chags par 'gyur/_/'dod chags rab tu spangs pas de nas nges par ni/_/chags pa dang bral sbyor ba yang ni ring du 'gyur/_/thabs kyi lag tu yang ni rdo rje dril bu dang /_/ci'i phyir shes rab
[\[10b.3\]]lag tu rdo rje 'di zhe na/_/bdud rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dang bde ba bsten phyir te/_/tshul khrims 'dzin pas mtshan ma shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po bcu bas lhag pa'i yon tan dge slong ste/_/dge slong bcu bas lhag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bzang /_/dpal ldan tshangs
[\[10b.4\]]par spyod dang ting nge 'dzin dang ni/_/byams pa la sogs dang ni de nyid nges pas so/_/dpag med bskal par theg pa ngan pa'i blo gros kyis/_/sbyin pa la sogs byin zhing brtul zhugs spyad na yang /_/bde gshegs rab 'khrungs sa 'dir rgyal po dge slong dag_/gnas 'di la
[\[10b.5\]]ni 'di ltar rab tu ma zhugs so/_/nyan thos theg pa nyid ni theg pa ma yin te/_/rang rgyal 'di ltar rgyal ba'i sa ni min par gsungs/_/dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa rgyal ba'i theg pa nyid/_/de yang gnyis las theg pa bar dang tha mar byed/_/de phyir bla na med pa'i theg pa bor
[\[10b.6\]]nas ni/_/'dod pa'i bla med byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na bug bcas gru yis rgya mtsho'i pha rol du/_/rin thang med pa'i nor bu'i phyir ni mi bgrod do/_/rang don la zhugs 'dod chags kyis ni bag med pa/_/slob mas rang gi chung ma ji srid ma phul ba/_/de srid
[\[10b.7\]]rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bla mas stsol lam ci/_/rnam par nyams pa'i blo yis 'di dag mi shes so/_/rnon po yis ni gser dang shel gyi rin po che/_/smyug ma yis ni go shiR+Sha yi tsan+dan te/_/phran tshegs rang gi chung ma yis ni sangs rgyas yum/_/de yis rab tu rnyed na 'di ru ci zhig skyon/_/
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]lam bzangs btang nas dgon pa dag tu 'jug byed cing /_/bde ba bzang po btang nas sdug bsngal len par byed/_/e ma blo gros phyin ci log gi skye bo rnams/_/dbang po la sogs kyis kyang bsten par mi nus pa/_/dpag med bskal ba'i bar du mi 'gyur
[\[11a.2\]]bde ba ni/_/bla ma dam pa bsten pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur/_/yang na thob nas 'di ltar nyams par mi 'gyur te/_/nges par ma bsten lhag ma dang bcas rnam par nyams/_/sems kyi bag med dbang gis dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal te/_/sems kyi drin gyis kyang ni thar pa bde
[\[11a.3\]]ba'o/_/rmi lam gzugs brnyan de ni su zhig gis byas te/_/bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gang gi drin gyis thob/_/bdud ni rang gi sems te bdud gzhan yod ma yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bde gshegs gzhan na med/_/bdud rnams bcom zhing rnam par rgyal ba'i thub
[\[11a.4\]]pa ni/_/sems kyis sems dag so so ru ni sad pa nyid/_/sems la cung zad srid pa gang zhig len pa min/_/dor ba ma yin 'phel zhing 'grib pa yang ma yin/_/sems la sems nyid so sor snang ba tsam du ni/_/khams gsum pa ni dngos po stong pas gnas par 'gyur/_/ngo
[\[11a.5\]]bo med pas stong par ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas la rab tu zhugs/_/shes rab lus ldan snying rje dang ni tha mi dad/_/byang chub sems nyid de ni yongs su bsgom par bya/_/shes rab yan lag bral zhing snying rjes tha dad na/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas la nam
[\[11a.6\]]yang 'gro ba min/_/shes rab la zhugs snying rje rnam par spangs pa ni/_/rin chen sems ni rtag pa la ni rab mi gnas/_/shes rab rnam thar yin la thabs ni snying rje'o/_/de gnyis dbus su gnyis su med pa gsungs pa ste/_/rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bde ba dam pa dpag
[\[11a.7\]]med pa/_/'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur smon lam tsam yin no/_/'jug pa'i sems dang smon pa yi ni sems nyid dag_/dbye ba cung zhig dag ni de gnyis dag la yod/_/'gro bar gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba nyid yin te/_/gang yang bye brag dag ni sems kyi dbang nyid do/_/'khor ba'i bde ba
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]smon pa yi ni sems yin te/_/dpag med bskal pa ru ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/_/ma nyams bde ba 'jug pa yi ni sems yin la/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug de bzhin bdag gi don/_/dpag med rgyu ru dge slong gis ni gang zhig bsrung /_/bde ba 'dod pa bde phyir gang zhig
[\[11b.2\]]tshol bar byed/_/de gnyis dbus su gnyis med sbyor ba rin po che/_/gang zhig len pa de ni mi zad yang dag zhugs/_/sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis bsdus rgyud las gsungs pa'i/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya zhes su grags/_/de nyid myang 'das 'bras bu rab tu ster mdzad
[\[11b.3\]]ma/_/shes rab la sogs rgyud las rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/_/'dod lus ma la chags par zhen pa 'dod can dang /_/dge slong sgyid lug can ni gtsug lag khang gnas pa/_/bde ba yi ni don du gang zhig las byed pa/_/de la rigs pas rgyal ba rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig_/skyon dang
[\[11b.4\]]bcas pa'i phyag rgya de ni yongs spangs la/_/phyag rgya bzang mo bde ba'i don du gzung bar bya/_/de med na ni lag pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/skye bo rnams la rang dbang yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs/_/gang zhig sems la rjes gnas mnyam pa'i bde ster dang /_/nyes skyon dang bral
[\[11b.5\]]srid pa sdug bsngal 'joms byed ma/_/du ma'i rnam pa'i yul gyi tha dad ma yin pa/_/de 'dir skye bo mkhas pas ci phyir 'dor bar byed/_/gang dag su zhig 'dod pa'i na chung bzang mo ni/_/dga' bas rgyal ba'i rdo rje mchod par ster byed ma/_/bde ba ma nyams de la byang chub
[\[11b.6\]]bar du ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa du ma yang dag mchod par bya/_/phyogs gcig tu ni dam tshig dag la rab zhugs ma/_/skal ldan bdag go zhes ni skul zhing smra byed de/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru rdo rje mchod mi byed/_/nyams pa'i sems de dmyal ba ru ni rab tu 'gro/_/lo ni bcu gnyis
[\[11b.7\]]lon pa'i bu mo dkar mo nyid/_/shin tu rnam dag sems ldan slob mas rnyed nas ni/_/shin tu gus pas legs par mchod pa nyid byas la/_/bla med dbang phyir bla ma la ni dbul bar bya/_/ston pa de yis de dang lhan cig dbang ster te/_/slob ma la ni bla med byang chub rgyu ru de/_/shes rab
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]dbang bskur bla ma'i zhal dang ldan pa yi/_/bzhi pa gzhan yang de dgyes pa yis ster ba mdzad/_/bla ma'i drin dag gis ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/yan lag drug gi sbyor bas rgyal dbang gzugs
[\[12a.2\]]brnyan dang /_/phyag rgya rab tu sbyor bas rnam dag bde ba la/_/yan lag bzang mo chags pa la ni rab tu zhe na/_/gtso bo bsgrub par bya phyir de ni btsal bar bya/_/phyogs gcig gnas la rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis/_/dngos grub ster ma de ni mang du mchod par bya/_/gtsang la rnam par
[\[12a.3\]]dben pa'i sa yi phyogs dag dang /_/rgyal ba'am ni zhi ba'i bde 'byung gnas dag tu/_/rtag par rgyal ba mchod phyir dri chen dri chu dang /_/chu la sogs pa rnams kyis byug pa byas nas ni/_/snying ga lte mgrin dpral ba spyi gtsug gsang ba la/_/rigs kyi lha mo rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya/_/
[\[12a.4\]]de bzhin mig la sogs pa rigs ni drug pa ste/_/stong pa la sogs sa bon sna tshogs rim pas so/_/de bzhin mchod pa lnga sogs rnams kyis mchod byas la/_/de nas chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab tu gzhug_/yan lag drug gi sbyor bas smig rgyu la sogs pa/_/ye shes dag gi me ni rab tu
[\[12a.5\]]bzhengs par bya/_/rim gyis rnal 'byor stobs kyis khyad par 'phags pa yi/_/rgyal ba rnams ni shes rab me yis rab tu bsreg_/de rnams rab bsregs zla ba'i gzugs ni bzhu ba las/_/bdud rtsi bzang po gang 'dzag de ni rdo rje can/_/de ni dbang gi dus su shin tu rnam dag blos/_/
[\[12a.6\]]thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru skad cig gcig la nyid/_/shes rab med kyang 'di ltar ri bong can bzhu las/_/gsum pa khyad par dga' ba'i mtha' ru kun nas btsal bar bya/_/'gro ba'i mgon gcig ston pa gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/khams gsum dag na bde ba khyad 'phags
[\[12a.7\]]gzhan ni med/_/bde ba mnyam ster dngos grub gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/lus bsrung don du srung ba gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/'dir ni dkyil 'khor dag dang sku gzugs ting 'dzin med/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya bya ba dang ni gdan rnams med/_/sngags dang gtor ma sbyin sreg cho ga rab
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gnas dang /_/gshegs su gsol ba rnam par dag pa'i chos la med/_/rang bzhin gyis dag 'gro ba yi ni rje dpon gcig_/shes rab me yis gal te rab tu bslangs pas na/_/de yi phyi nas rang gi lus po la ni bdud stobs bzhi/_/de nyid gcig pu yis ni nyams par mdzad pa yin/_/
[\[12b.2\]]ji srid de ma bzhengs par bde ba ster ba med/_/rab tu bzhengs pas 'dod chags bral nyid 'gyur ba yin/_/gnyis su med pa'i lam gcig 'di ni dka' ba ste/_/ma lus sems can rnams ni lam gnyis dag pas 'gro/_/ma bsdams dbang gis brgya la zin par ma gyur na/_/chu skyes
[\[12b.3\]]snying por dpal ldan byang chub sems lhung 'gyur/_/phyag rgya'i sems ni shin tu rnam dag shes byas nas/_/de nas chu skyes phyi rol rang gi khas gzung bya/_/ma dag phyag rgya'i chu skyes la gnas rang gi sems/_/ma nyams rnams kyis ma tshor ming med kyis gzung bya/_/myang ba'i don du
[\[12b.4\]]rnam par nyams pa'i bdud rtsi gang /_/dpal ldan sngags pa rnams la 'chi ba nyams par byed/_/bud med skye gnas sbyor ba'i dbang gis rang gi sems/_/gang zhig skyes bu rnams kyi 'gyur ba mi 'gyur la/_/rgyal bas mchod pa thugs rje che ldan de rnams kyi/_/zhabs gnyis dag la
[\[12b.5\]]mgo bo yis ni phyag bgyi'o/_/na chung ma la sbyor bas dpal ldan byang chub sems/_/gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bsrung mdzad cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i/_/de rnams zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni phyag bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi bde ba dpag med
[\[12b.6\]]thob na yang /_/sems can rnams kyi don phyir 'dor bar mdzad gyur cing /_/'khor ba'i nang du rab tu 'jug pa'i dpa' bo ste/_/de rnams zhabs kyi pad mar spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyin dang mtshan du bsam gtan stobs kyi rim pa yis/_/gang rnams rang gi sems ni rtsa dbus
[\[12b.7\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/mtha' yas gzugs las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o/_/thar pa'i bde rgyu dang po yis ni sangs rgyas la/_/gnyis med de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do/_/mnga' bdag dus kyi 'khor lo khams gsum la gnas
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]pa/_/mi 'gyur thig le sbyor bas yang dag thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi me long nang du ni/_/ma mthong mthong lta'i bra ti se na'i don lta byed/_/de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba ni/_/de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis nam mkhar mthong /_/mngon
[\[13a.2\]]sum dag tu gzugs ni dngos po stong pa'i phyir/_/dngos po dang ni dngos med de ru med pa yin/_/sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam rdzu 'phrul mtshungs pa ni/_/de la 'bras bu yod cing dngos po med pa'o/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/ma skyes chos rnams la ni skyes pa mthong bar
[\[13a.3\]]'gyur/_/rnam pa kun ldan kun nas rnam par dag pa dang /_/dbang po thams cad dang ldan kun gyi snying gar gnas/_/ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dag gis/_/sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'dod rdzogs byed/_/de bzhin bsam pa'i dbang gis rdzogs
[\[13a.4\]]pa de nyid ni/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos las skye bar 'gyur/_/stong pa yis ni rgyu la gsal bar rgyu yis ni/_/rang gi stong pa la ni nges par rgyas gdab ste/_/phyi dang lus po dag dang gzhan rnams gcig tu ste/_/lta ba drug la gnas dang gzhan rnams slu bar byed/_/mi 'gyur
[\[13a.5\]]lam nyams rang gi don la gnas pa yi/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de nyid du ma'i gzhung gis brtags/_/tshangs pa'am ni seng ge mchog gi dbang phyug gam/_/de bzhin byed po yis ni chos ni gang smras pa/_/rig byed mtha' dag grub mtha'i gzhung dang nges tshig gis/_/mdor bsdus
[\[13a.6\]]de nyid 'di ru rnam par dpyad par bgyi/_/gal te skye dgu rnams la skyed byed gcig nyid 'dir/_/ji ltar rigs dag 'di ni rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur/_/tshad ma dang ni dpe dang tshul gyi dbye ba yis/_/yongs su brtags na rnam par mthun par mi 'gyur ro/_/pha gcig dag la nges par bu ni bzhir
[\[13a.7\]]gyur na/_/bu de rnams la nges par rigs ni gcig yin no/_/de ltar mchog tu 'dod las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyi/_/rigs kyi rnam pa bzhi ru rigs pa yod ma yin/_/ji ltar u dum wA ra'i shing las skyes pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/rtsa ba dbus dang rtse mo las byung gang zhig rnams/_/gzugs
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]dang rnam par reg bya ro rnams 'dra ba ste/_/de bzhin kha nyid la sogs gnas ni gcig tu 'gyur/_/kha las skyes pa ri bong 'od zer dkar ma yin/_/dpung pa las skyes nyin byed shar dang 'dra ba min/_/brla nas skyes pa ldong ros kha dog dang 'dra min/_/rkang pa las skyes mig sman chen
[\[13b.2\]]po gnag 'dra min/_/gnyis skyes thams cad ye shes rigs min rgyal rigs ni/_/rgyal po'i rigs las skyes pas dpa' bo rnams ma yin/_/rje'u rigs thams cad phun sum tshogs dang ldan pa yin/_/'jig rten du ni dmangs rigs las chen mi byed do/_/khams kyi dbye bas
[\[13b.3\]]bde dang sdug bsngal dngos po dang /_/lung dang rigs pas bsod nams tshogs dang sdig pa dang /_/skye dang 'jig rten mnyam pa nyams su myong ba ste/_/mi rigs rnam pa bzhi ni de ltar 'gyur ba'o/_/rdzogs ldan dus su rigs kyi dbye ba yod ma yin/_/gsum ldan 'jug pa gtso
[\[13b.4\]]bo dang ni 'khor 'gyur ro/_/dus gnyis la ni dngos po nyams par mi 'gyur te/_/gang zhig gnyis ldan dus su rigs dang rigs min nyid/_/de dang ser sna rgyu dang dregs pa nga rgyal dang /_/chags pa zhe sdang gis ni rigs ni ldog par 'gyur/_/rigs rnams byas nas rnam pa sna
[\[13b.5\]]tshogs 'gyur ba ste/_/gzhan na rigs dang rigs min sde 'byung kha dog med/_/byed pa po yi rang lus rim pa ji lta ba/_/kha nyid dang ni dpung pa brla dang rkang pa las/_/bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dang dmangs rigs skyes gyur na/_/phyugs dang tha ma las skyes de yi gang nas byung /_/
[\[13b.6\]]tshangs pa'i kha nyid las skyes bram ze grags pa na/_/bram ze mo yang gnas de nyid las yin nam ci/_/gal te 'di dag skye gnas gcig las skyes gyur na/_/ming po dang ni sring mo bag mar rigs ma yin/_/gal te yin na kla klo'i skye bo 'jug par 'gyur/_/kla klo 'jug par gyur na
[\[13b.7\]]rigs ni nyams pas te/_/rigs zad na ni dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_/rang gi rigs ni 'dzin phyir de dag la 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dpung brla rkang pa las byung rnams la ni/_/gang zhig rang gi rigs ni 'dzin phyir ldog par 'gyur/_/de phyir drang srong rigs ni bag ma'i dus dag tu/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas brtag par byed pa'o/_/du ma sna tshogs rigs dang rnam pa stong phrag pa/_/bag ma len pa'i dus su rnam par brtag par byed/_/gang phyir drang srong rigs ni brtag par byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir mchod 'dod lus las rigs ni ma
[\[14a.2\]]yin no/_/ye shes kyis ni rigs dang rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dang /_/de bzhin khyad par dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba ste/_/de phyir ye shes che 'di rnam par dag pa yin/_/gzhan du na ni rang gi rigs kyis rigs 'gyur min/_/tshangs min skye ba'i gnas ni drang srong rgyas sogs pa/_/skye gnas
[\[14a.3\]]tshangs pa'i go 'phang rab tu zhugs par 'gyur/_/de phyir dka' thub bzang po dor nas rigs kyis ni/_/rnam par dag pa'i lam ni ster bar mi 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma dang ni rin po che dang mu tig dang /_/'dam dang ri bo dang ni thod pa'i sbyor las 'byung /_/de nyid rnams ni ma lus 'jig rten
[\[14a.4\]]mchod gnas 'gyur/_/de rnams sngon gyi skye gnas las ni ma yin no/_/kha las chos ni ston par byed cing sgrogs byed pas/_/de phyir bram ze rnams ni kha las skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyal rigs rnams ni dpung pas 'khrugs par byed pa ste/_/dpung pa de dag las ni de rnams skye bar
[\[14a.5\]]'gyur/_/brla yi stobs kyis rje rigs skye bo 'gron por byed/_/de phyir de rnams de las skyes par gyur pa'o/_/rkang pa'i rtsa bar brten par byed par grags pa yis/_/de phyir rkang pa las ni dmangs rigs skye bar 'gyur/_/de phyir gzhan rnams rigs kyi dbye ba bco brgyad yin/_/
[\[14a.6\]]rang gi las kyi rang bzhin las kyi ngo bor skyes/_/'jig rten gsum du las kyi mthu ni stobs dang ldan/_/gang phyir bram ze yang ni dmangs rigs nyid du 'gyur/_/sgog skya dag dang btsong dang bza' min zos pa dang /_/chang 'thungs nas ni dmangs rigs gnas su 'gyur ba ste/_/
[\[14a.7\]]dka' thub byas nas slar yang bram ze de nyid du/_/'gyur de de phyir dka' thub khyad par can yin no/_/grog ma dang ni ra ri dag dang sna mtshan dang /_/rgyas ba la sogs drang srong gzhan rnams rab grags pa/_/tshangs pa'i skye gnas min las kyang ni de rnams skyes/_/dka' thub khyad par
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dag gi drang srong rnams su 'gyur/_/de phyir rang gi rigs kyi dag dang ma dag pa/_/don dam pa yi rgyu yis gang yang med par 'gyur/_/zhe sdang dbang gis rigs 'di rab tu 'byung ba ste/_/rang don 'dod pa'i bram zes nor gyi don du byas/_/dag pa'i bram ze mo gang bdag po'i brtul
[\[14b.2\]]zhugs can/_/skyes bu gzhan ma la ni de yis rten par byed/_/de yi bu ni 'di ru bram zer gyur pa ste/_/de phyir rigs ni ji ltar rim pas ma yin no/_!_/lus 'di'i snga ma'i rigs kyi thal ba gzhan yin la/_/las kyi dbang las pha yi srog kyang gzhan yin te/_/gzhan du lus
[\[14b.3\]]dang srog dag gi ni rigs dag kyang /_/bu dang bcas pa su zhig gis ni 'byin par byed/_/gzhan du rigs kyang gal te pha yi yin na ni/_/pha yi pha gang de ni mes po'i yin par 'gyur/_/de ltar 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad rang gi rigs/_/gnyis skyes rnams la drang srong rigs gzhan
[\[14b.4\]]yod ma yin/_/rngon pa bdun yang ri dgas dag dang ngur pa dang /_/ngang pa de rnams gnyis skyes su yang slar byung 'gyur/_/gang phyir skye ba gzhan du srog ni las dbang gis/_/yin pa de phyir nang na drang srong rigs med do/_/gnyis skyes tshim nas nam mkha' dang ni sa yi gnas/_/gang
[\[14b.5\]]yin der ni shi ba tshim par mngon par 'dod/_/zos pa dag kyang ma zhu'i dbang las bag med pa/_/pha yi bag med du 'gyur 'di ni ngo mtshar ro/_/sh+loka bzhi po 'di lnga 'gyur la med pa/_chos rje yid bzang rtse pas pan chen rin po che'i phyag dpe gnyis gtugs nas 'gyur bcos mdzad pa na yod pas bar 'dir 'jug go/_!_/_
[\[14b.6\]]gal te gnyis skyes dang ni pho rog gis zan zos/_/shi ba'i pha ni pha rol tu ni tshim par byed/_/dge ba dang ni mi dge ba yi rgyu mtshan des/_/pha de nyid kyi sngon du bsags pa nyams par 'gyur/_/rang gis byin pa rang nyid kyis ni thob 'gyur te/_/gzhan ma rnams kyi sbyin pa bsngos pa'i blo yis
[\[14b.7\]]min/_/bde bar gshegs pas rang gi don du rang sha ni/_/sbyin min de bzhin du yang de rnams nges grol phyir/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis gzhung kun rnams las ni/_/srog gcod kyis ni grol ba yod pa ma yin no/_/mchod sbyin la ni srog gcod de bzhin smra byed pa/_/e ma gnyis
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]skyes rnams kyis mi shes gnas yin no/_/mchod sbyin la ni gsad cing gsod pa gang yang med/_/'jig rten gsad bya lha ru nges par 'gro med de/_/snying rje dang ni nges par zhi ba dang bral ba'i/_/gnyis skyes skyon can rnams kyi tshig 'di yin par 'gyur/_/dbul po'i
[\[15a.2\]]sdug bsngal dang ni 'dod pa dang bral nas/_/rang gi rtsa lag grogs po yid 'ong bu dang tsha/_/de rnams bde bar 'dod dang bde 'gro 'dod pa na/_/gal te tshig 'di bden yin de rnams sreg par byed/_/bu dang rtsa lag stobs med la sogs shi gyur na/_/ngu 'bod nas ni dur khrod dag tu phyin pa
[\[15a.3\]]dang /_/shi ba rnams la gang gis chu dang zan sbyin na/_/rmongs pa de yis ji ltar ma skyes la sogs gsod/_/a shwat+tha la brten dang til snod sbyin pa dang /_/ba la reg pa dang ni bram ze tshim pa dang /_/gang+gA'i chu dang b+ha ra ta ni thos pa ste/_/'di rnams kyis ni gal te sdig nyams byed 'gyur
[\[15a.4\]]na/_/mkha' 'gro yis ni a shwat+tha la brten par byed/_/til mkhan gyis ni til gyi snod ni sbyin pa ste/_/ba skyob ke'u yis ba la reg par byed pa dang /_/mkhas min dag kyang gnyis skyes rnams la ston mo ster/_/gang+gA'i chu ni rus sbal dang ni nya yis 'thungs/_/ma skyes pa yis
[\[15a.5\]]b+ha ra ta yi grags pa thos/_/de rnams la ni sngon bsags las kyi 'bras bu med/_/dran pa'i tshad ma yis ni dka' thub nyams 'gyur min/_/a shwat+tha la brten dang til snod sbyin pa gang /_/ba la reg dang gnyis skyes tshim pa ci yin dang /_/gang+gA'i chu dang b+ha ra ta ni thos pa ci/_/
[\[15a.6\]]lam ni nyams par gyur pas 'di nyid mi shes so/_/yon tan 'phel ba yul gyis rgyas par 'gyur ba yi/_/gang la steng dang 'og tu lcug ma rgyas par 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten du ni las kyis bcings pa yi/_/'og tu rtsa ba rnams ni tshugs par 'gyur ba ste/_/de bzhin gzugs
[\[15a.7\]]med gang la nye bar thob pa med/_/thog ma med la tha ma med cing rab gnas med/_/a shwat+tha shing de la nges par brten pa ni/_/klu don 'bras bu las ni rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/til ni sems can yin zhing snod nyid snod yin te/_/shing rnams rab tu sbyin pa til snod sbyin pa'o/_/ba ni
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]lha yi mig yin reg pa snang ba ste/_/ba la reg pa 'di nyid nges par brjod par 'gyur/_/gnyis skyes me ste srog chags tshogs kyi lus la ni/_/tshim par byed pa de ni gnyis skyes tshim pa'o/_/gang+gA'i chu nyid zla ba'i bdud rtsi btung ba ste/_/ser sna zad pa b+ha ra ta ni thos pa'o/_/phyi ma'i tshe yi rgyu
[\[15b.2\]]ru sgra mkhan gyis kyang ni/_/rig byed ma lus yi ge kha ton byed par 'gyur/_/dran pa dang ni rig byed gzhung gi sna tshogs pa/_/mi shes dbang gis 'bras med mgrin pa skams par byed/_/rig byed tshad ma dang ni dran pa tshad ma ste/_/'di nyid tshig ni shin tu 'gal ba'i phyogs yin no/_/dam
[\[15b.3\]]pa'i chos las gsungs pa'i tshig ni tshad ma ste/_/rgyal ba'i gsung ni 'di nyid rnam par dag pa'o/_/nub phyogs sin+d+hu'i yul du gnyis skyes rnams kyis ni/_/thod pa can dang dmangs rigs dag gi zan za ru/_/ri bcas yul du ba lang sha dang ma he dang /_/de bzhin du yang chang ni gtsang mar bsten pa
[\[15b.4\]]yin/_/gau ta ma la sogs yul du ma he'i sha gtsang bar/_/ma ga la sogs yul du rta sha la sogs bsten/_/in+d+ra la sogs dang ni ma gsog yul du/_/ma he'i sha dang phag sha bza' bar mi rung ngo /_/mgul kha la sogs yul du ma sogs bzung ba ni/_/bu la sogs pa rnams la

[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ral pa 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug gis/_/zla ba la ni zhen pas long ba gsad pa yin/_/phyi nas dus kyi dbang gis stobs ldan bskyed pa ste/_/de nas lha dbang rnams kyis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa yin/_/gal te brdzun gyi lo rgyus kyi ni tshig rnams kyis/_/chos

[\[16a.5\]]par byed/_/sha za ba yi mi ni shin tu skrag par byed/_/me lha 'di dag la sogs mi 'dod tshig yin no/_/bud med pas ni mtho ris gnas su mi 'gro na/_/'jig rten grags pa'i tshad ma gal te 'dir 'gyur te/_/ne tso la sogs gzhan yang gzhon nu'i dus su ni/_/dka' thub byas

[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]nas lam ni nyams par 'gyur/_/mi shes pa yi dbang gis srog gcod byas nas ni/_/rang rig nga rgyal dbang gis dmyal bar zhugs par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug khyab 'jug gzugs gcig 'dir/_/drag pos ci yi phyir na tshangs pa'i mgo bo gcod/_/gal te drag po

[\[17a.1\]]bsam pa sna tshogs e ma ngo mtshar che/_/khyab 'jug de nyid blo yis rab tu 'jug pa gzhan/_/shing las skyes pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/dgun la sogs pa'i dus kyi mtshan mo'i mtha' ru ni/_/'dar ba dang ldan chu yis khrus ni byed pa ste/_/grang bas 'dzin dang rab

[\[17b.1\]]'dzin gyis dman pa nor ni sogs par 'dod/_/ta la steng nas bcad bzhin zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/gzhan ma rnams kyang rigs kyi gnas su rab zhugs nas/_/bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa mang po za bar byed/_/snying rje dang bral mnyam pa'i bde bas dman pa dang /_/'jig rten 'gal ba

[\[19a.1\]]g.yo ba mo dang phra mo gzhan yang drag mo dang /_/dge ma la sogs gzhan ma bde 'byung nus pa gang /_/du ba la sogs ma lus pha rol phyin pa ste/_/de bzhin gzhan ni pad+ma'i 'dab dang dbus su'o/_/dbus su dbang phyug che dang shar du skyes bu ste/_/g.yas su

[\[19b.1\]]da de yi snying dbus yang dag gnas/_/dga' ba'i tshul du dri med shin tu zhi ba ste/_/de yi steng du thog ma 'khrig pa dang po'o/_/yang dag lhung ba'i tshul gyis 'dod pa rnams kyang byed/_/skal ldan b+ha ga zhes bya de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de la bzhi po dag dang gzhan yang lnga po dang /_/de bzhin du ni drug dang

[\[20a\]]

[\[23a.1\]]khams dang dbang po rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid las stong pa gnyis pa'i bstod pa gsungs pa/_rnam par bcas kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o/_/gang mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mas 'khyud pa de'i sa gnyis su med pa de kho na la phyag 'tshal gyi
[\[23a.2\]]gzhan la ma yin zhes pa'o/_/shes rab ma ni gang stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma zhes pa b+ha ga ni chos kyi dbyings te/_thams cad du 'gro yang de kho na nyid ma rig pa rnams kyis blta bar bya ba ma yin pa dang /_dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gang la yod pa'o
[\[23a.3\]]zhes pa'o/_/ji skad du phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler/_ji ltar til son til mar dang /_/ji ltar shing la son pa'i me/_/de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la/_/yang dag gnas kyang mi mthong ba/_/chos kyi dbyings ni b+ha gar bshad/_/b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog_/gang phyir dbang phyug
[\[23a.4\]]sogs yon tan/_/ldan pa de phyir b+ha gar bshad/_/ces so/_/ci'i mtshan nyid can zhe na/_gsungs pa/_rnam par bcas kyang rnam med do/_/rnam pa ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ste/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don mthong ba'i phyir rgya che ba dang /_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don med pa'i

[\[23b.3\]]rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_rnam pa med pa nyid kyi phyir shes bya ma lus pa mthong ba las sangs rgyas so zhes rim pa kho nas so/_/kye'i rdo rjer yang /_dngos dang dngos po med pa dang /_/dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa/_/zhes so/_/mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes pa rnam
[\[23b.4\]]dbye med pa'i tshig go/_/yang na bcom ldan 'das zhes pa 'di dang khyad par gyi bsdu pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir mun pa'i gnas skabs dang bral ba las kun mkhyen no/_/de gsungs pa/_sad pa'i skabs song sangs rgyas te/_/thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bsgrags pa/_/thams cad
[\[23b.5\]]rig cing nges grol ba/_/mun pa'i skabs song med pa'o/_/zhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes pa khams drug rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid can gyi b+ha ga 'di la yod pas na'o/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang /_dbang phyug dang ni
[\[23b.6\]]gzugs bzang dang /_/dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang /_/brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste/_/drug rnams b+ha ga zhes par bshad/_/sum cu rtsa drug khams dag pa/_/sa sogs rdo rje btsun mo rnams/_/de yi yon tan dbang phyug sogs/_/drug po de rnams

[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]po dang nag po'i phyogs dag ste/_de dag gis rdo rje la mi gnas pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku cha bcu drug la ni zhes so/_/gang ye shes kyi le'ur gsung par 'gyur ba/_'dir shes rab ni cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid dkar po'i phyogs so/_/nag po'i phyogs zla ba'i cha

[\[24a.4\]]pa'i cha bcu drug pa stong pa nyid kyi chos can te/_lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ru brjod de/_rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bzhi pa zad pa las rgyu mthun pa'o/_/de ltar na ma ning ngo zhes grub bo zhes so/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang /_/skye dang 'jig pa dkar po dang /_/nag po'i phyogs de rab gnas pa'o/_/de
[\[24a.5\]]dag dbus su gang ba gang /_/gang ba de ni mi gnas nyid/_/ces so/_/'gyur med bde ba zhes pa nor bu dang /_pad+ma las 'gyur ba med pas na 'gyur med de 'dis bde ba zhes pa byang chub kyi sems rnam 'gyur med pa gang gi yin pa zhes pa'o/_/dgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs/_/zhes
[\[24a.6\]]pa dgod pa kho na bde ba gang gi dang po yin la/_bde ba kho na bde ba nyid de/_sogs pa'i sgra las lta ba dang 'khyud pa dang lag bcangs dang gnyis sbyor du brjod pa ste de spangs pa zhes pa'o/_/'o na mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba kho nas chos pa ma yin nam/_dgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs/_/zhes
[\[24a.7\]]zlos pa gsungs pa ci'i don zhe na/_bden mod/_de kho na nyid ma yin pa la de kho na nyid du mngon par nga rgyal ba bsal ba'i don du ste/_gzhan du na lha la yod pa'i bde ba yang de kho na nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa/_dbang po gnyis skyes bde ba lha/_/chags can rnams kyi
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]de nyid bshad/_/'jig rten gsum spyod las grol ba/_/'gyur med bde ba sangs rgyas kyi'o/_/dgod dang lta la sogs las grol/_/gnyis sbyor thams cad rnam par spangs/_/rgyu dang 'bras las nges grol ba/_/'jig rten gsum snang gnyis su med/_/ces so/_/sangs rgyas
[\[24b.2\]]rnams kyis skyed par mdzad/_/ces pa/_sangs rgyas rnams te phung po lnga rnams 'dod chags chen po'i mes 'khor lo'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir/_skyed byed skye dgu'i bdag po ste/_/gti mug rnams g.yo ba med pa'i ro'i khams ltar ro zhes pa'o/_/sku
[\[24b.3\]]gsum rnams dang ldan pa zhes pa chos kyi sku la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa'o/_/'o na ye shes kyi sku sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir/_sems la sogs pa'i chos dang bral ba rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/_rnam par shes pa'i chos

[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]ba las zhes pa la 'dir ye shes ni rnal 'byor ba'i 'dzin pa'i sems so/_/rnam par shes pa ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa gzung bar bya ba shes bya'i mtshan nyid can no/_/de ltar 'dzin pa'i sems ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi shes rab ste/_rtog pa dang bral ba nyid kyi

[\[25b.1\]]gnas skabs zad pa las dpral bar dri ma med par sprul ba'i sku gzugs ma lus pa ston pa'o/_/nor bu chen po rin chen tog_/ces pa'o/_/de ltar lhan cig skyes pa gcig po de kho na chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'o zhes pa rnam pa bzhi'o zhes so/_/dus gsum

[\[27a.1\]]gnyis 'gags pa yis/_'jig rten 'dren pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/zhes te/_rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/_/zhes grub bo/_/byang chub sems zhes pa dpal 'dus pa la sogs par yongs su bshad pa ste/_thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/_/dngos dang dngos med zad

[\[28a.1\]]de yang bcom ldan 'das 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar bas rnam par dag pa ye shes rdo rje shes rab dang /_thabs kyi bdag nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i sku thams cad shes pa nyid thob pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_thams cad gzigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/mchan

[\[28a.7\]]gsungs she na bden mod/_seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyang yod do zhes pas/_de'i 'dod pa bsal ba'i ched du ste gang gi phyir de rnams la sems can thams cad kyi skad kyis chos thams cad ston pa bo nyid med pa'o/_/'o na gang thams cad mkhyen pa de
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]kho na ye shes kyi sku can ma yin nam/_ci'i phyir ye shes kyi sku zhes zlos pa gsung zhe na/_bden mod gzhan nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gsal ba'i ched du ste gang gi phyir de rnams lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas

[\[28b.3\]]med bag chags yod min pas/_/dri med nam mkha' ji bzhin no/_/zhes so/_/'o na gang ye shes kyi sku de kho na mi shes pa'i mun pa 'joms pa nyid kyi phyir nyin mor byed pa'i sku ma yin nam/_ci'i don du nyin mor byed pa'i sku zhes zlos pa'i tshig gsung zhe na/_bden mod/_gzhan rnam
[\[28b.4\]]par shes par smra ba'i sangs rgyas pa rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ye shes kyi sku nyin mor byed pa'i sku rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las 'das pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes pa'o/_/'o na gang rgyud du brjod par bya ba'i ye shes kyi sku de gzugs
